headline: Opera That’s Barely Opera at All
abstract: Prototype, an annual exploration of new opera, encompassed “Cion,” a haunting South African mixture of choreography and voice.
lead_paragraph: The Prototype festival’s tagline is “opera, theater, now,” and it is usually described as a presenter of new opera. But it speaks to this annual January event’s capaciousness, its wide-open eyes and ears, that the most memorable show this year — I saw five of the six offerings last week — was barely an opera at all.
